local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, "Handle") local Icify = WaitForChild(Tool, "Icify") local Character, Torso, Humanoid

local ballSpike = ballPrototype:Clone() ballSpike.Size = Vector3.new(.2, .2, .2) ballSpike.Transparency = 0 ballSpike.BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, ballSpike:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) SnowflakeMesh:Clone().Parent = ballSpike
for i = 1, NUM_SPIKES do local newBallSpike = ballSpike:Clone() local spikeWeld = Instance.new("ManualWeld") spikeWeld.Name = "SpikeWeld" spikeWeld.Part0 = ballPrototype spikeWeld.Part1 = newBallSpike spikeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() spikeWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(i*math.pi*2/NUM_SPIKES, 0, 0)
spikeWeld.Parent = newBallSpike newBallSpike.Parent = ballPrototype end
function gunUp() Tool.Grip = Tool.Grip * CFrame.Angles(-0.2, 0, 0) end
function gunOut() Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -0.5, 1, 1, -2.62268344e-007, -1.74845511e-007, 2.62268344e-007, 1, -1.31134215e-007, 1.74845553e-007, 1.31134158e-007, 1) end
function freezeCharacter(character) if character:FindFirstChild("Icify") then return end local newIcify = Icify:Clone() newIcify.Parent = character newIcify.Disabled = false end
local HitHumTimes = {} local HumSlows = {}
function slowCharacter(humanoid) if not HumSlows[humanoid] then HumSlows[humanoid] = 0 end local newHumSlows = HumSlows[humanoid] + 1 HumSlows[humanoid] = newHumSlows
local newWalkSpeed = 16 for i = 1, HumSlows[humanoid] do newWalkSpeed = newWalkSpeed * (1 - SLOW_PERCENTAGE) end
humanoid.WalkSpeed = newWalkSpeed
delay(4, function() if HumSlows[humanoid] == newHumSlows then HumSlows[humanoid] = 0 humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end) -- if haven't been hit for 4 seconds, they're back to normal end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid game.Debris:AddItem(creator_tag, 1) end
function onIceballHit(hitPart) local vPlayer = nil if Character then vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) end local safeHumanoid = nil if Character then safeHumanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
if not hitPart then return end local hitChar = hitPart.Parent if not hitChar then return end local hitHum = hitChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") -- in case it hit a hat, wanna check the hit hat's hit if not hitHum then hitChar = hitChar.Parent if not hitChar then return end hitHum = hitChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not hitHum then return end end
if hitHum == safeHumanoid then return end -- don't hurt shooter
local currTime = tick() if not HitHumTimes[hitHum] or HitHumTimes[hitHum] < currTime then HitHumTimes[hitHum] = currTime + .5 if hitHum.Health > 0 then hitHum:TakeDamage(ICE_BALL_DAMAGE)
-- slow down humanoid here slowCharacter(hitHum)
-- maybe freeze them too, if not already frozen if math.random() < FREEZE_CHANCE then freezeCharacter(hitChar) end
tagHumanoid(hitHum, vPlayer) end end end
function fireAt(startPos, targetPos) local newBall = ballPrototype:Clone() newBall.CFrame = CFrame.new(startPos) newBall.Velocity = (targetPos - startPos).unit * ICE_BALL_SPEED newBall.Parent = workspace
newBall.Touched:connect(onIceballHit) game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(newBall, 4) end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() Character = Tool.Parent if not Character then return end
Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if (not Torso) or (not Humanoid) then return end
if not Tool.Enabled then return false end Tool.Enabled = false
wait() -- for .TargetPoint replication?
gunUp() fireAt(Handle.CFrame.p, Humanoid.TargetPoint) BlastSound:Play()
wait(.5) gunOut() wait(.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") if myMouse ~= nil then myMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end

myMouse = mouse
if Tool.Enabled then mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
